bio.summary: I am a highly motivated Magento/PHP developer with over 3 years experience who loves to solve problems and continually learn new technologies and ideas.  As the Magento/PHP specialist at Warner Music and FlexShopper, a start-up internet company, I successfully developed highly customized and sophisticated Magento extensions for their ecommerce solutions.  I also developed complex PHP scripts, SQL queries, RESTful API, and other web-based technologies to improve and address critical problems.  I have obtained the coveted Magento Certified Developer Plus certification, which requires a deeper understanding of the underlying structure of Magento and its Enterprise Edition in order to develop module extensions.  I have also obtain the Zend Certified PHP Engineer certification which is an industry-wide standard that recognizes PHP programming expertise and is a measure of distinction for employers.  Holding these combined certifications should give potential employers/clients confidence that I have the essential knowledge in order to successfully develop PHP/Magento extensions.  In addition, I have a BS in engineering from a top engineering university, Texas A & M University, ranked #11 by US News & World Report in 2014.  I was also a lawyer at one point, which gives a strong indication of my range of abilities and experience along with how capable I am at learning new and different concepts.  Therefore, I believe my extensive skills, experience, and credentials will be a valuable addition to any development team.  Finally, I am a highly motivated, hard-working professional who continually strive to be creative, productive, an over-achiever, and an enjoyable team member to work with.

work.summary: •  The majority of my duties were to debug and fix the many bugs/errors produced by their highly customized extensions such as payment gateway, warehouse management, pre-order management, product import/export, etc.  I also developed custom Magento extensions to add desired features/functions when the need arises.

highlights.1: Fixed defects of highly customized extensions such as payment gateway, warehouse management, pre-order management.
highlights.2: Developed Magento extension, Newsletter Pop-up extension, that creates a subscription pop-up when a button is click with a minimum age filter.  It also has system configurations allowing flexible parameters such enable/disable, age, session, additional fields, and pop-up disable.
highlights.3: Developed Magento extension, call Special Virtual Product, that overrides the default action for virtual products and allow for customer address input during the checkout process.

work.summary: Specialized in developing back-end and front-end extensions and plugins for Magento Enterprise that were highly customized for FlexShopper’s application needs.  These extensions were highly sophisticated such as a shipping module that is capable of making calls to UPS’s API on a per item basis rather than on a per cart basis.  Another example is a marketplace module that automates the importation and daily updates of third party vendor’s products into Magento.

highlights.1: Developed and implemented custom PHP scripts to import massive number of products (i.e. up to 100,000 products) into Magento.  Also develop PHP scripts to update inventory, price, content, etc. on a daily basis using cron jobs.
highlights.2: Developed highly customized payment gateway module for FlexShopper’s patented payment, financing product.
highlights.3: Skillfully developed PHP scripts to implement Service Oriented Architects and RESTful APIs using JSON, XML, and SOAP to process various data from 3rd party vendors, partners, or Magento’s MySQL database.
highlights.4: Developed highly customized Magento extensions to achieve desired features/funtions such as custom shipping calculation, checkout process, shipping options, landing page builder, etc.
highlights.5: Developed front end design and solutions by successfully utilizing web technologies such as PHP, HTML5, CSS, Jquery, Ajax, and JavaScript.

education.institution: Chapman University Dale E. Fowler School of Law
